project.name: My Sample Project
project.description: This is a sample project for developing the duke83/ManagementToolsDev application

sprints.description: First sprint is meant to provide initial feature set and shape of project.  It will/should change in the next sprint. Provide the context to make meaningful changes in the next sprint.
Second sprint will flesh out and solidify feature set.  It will/should change in the next sprint. Provide the context to make meaningful changes in the next sprint.
